ygData.subject: Re: Mesmerization
ygData.msgSnippet: that is mesmerize. it works really well yes. I m talking about mesmerization, the AOE version at level 16. Skara  ... From: Shawn Alley
ygData.messageBody:
that is mesmerize. it works really well yes.
I'm talking about mesmerization, the AOE version at level 16.
Skara <Elite>

-----Original Message-----
From: Shawn Alley [mailto:ShawnA@...]
Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 11:06 AM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Mesmerization


From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>

When I was playing my necro in Paw I got in over my head when a captain
came to join the fun I was having with 2 nobles. Luckily for me a group
was near and a nice enchanter cast mesmorize on the offending MOBs. I
went unconscious in the process so wasn't attacking them to make them
made again. I ran away once I could stand up and one of their party
healed me a bit so I could go faster than a crawl. Mes saved me thanks
to a helpful enchanter.

-----Original Message-----
From: DeGirolami, Franck [mailto:degirolami@...]
Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 11:00 AM
To: Eqenchanters (E-mail)
Subject: [eqenchanters] Mesmerization


From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>

well it took me quite some time to get this spell...now I have it.
and it does not do a thing. I used it plenty of times in unrest
yesterday
night on a horde of green death beetles. Nothing!
Occasionnaly one would resist and come for me, that's all!
What's the deal? Anybody has some info on this spell?
Skara <Elite>
